summary: A suite of unit tests that validate the functionality of the Omikuji backend in the Annif indexing system, covering training file creation, default configuration, suggestion generation, and handling of missing inputs, models, vectorizers, as well as caching, n‑gram support, empty document scenarios, and parameter settings.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability and correctness of the Omikuji backend for automated subject indexing, ensuring it behaves as expected across typical and edge‑case conditions before deployment.
